name: Intergalactic Corporation Regional Manager Simulator
description:
You are valued employee 4227b/6 from sector branch ZZ9 Plural Z Alpha of Intergalactic Corp. your friendly intergalactic conglomerate.

You have recently been promoted to regional manager of Supervaluableunobtainium collection, a rare resource that can only be found inside living Globflobs, a slime like creature from the planet Globocron Flobsei 8.

You are now in charge of harvesting the Globflobs, while keeping protestors away from your work.

Place traps in the Globflobs habitat to relocate them and borrow their Supervaluableunobtainium.

Drop turrets in empty parking spots to deter protesters.
